attributes.action: Reinstate the Moving of the Nelson Mandela statue petition.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Convention for the Protection of Human Rights and Fundamental Freedoms. Article 10

Everyone has the right to freedom of expression. This right shall include freedom to hold opinions and to receive and impart information and ideas without interference by public authority regardless of frontiers.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
